bug.author: adamcrume
bug.summary: Travis build fails because of corrupt Bazel installation
bug.description: The build often fails with: Uncompressing......Error: corrupt installation: file '/home/travis/.cache/bazel/_bazel_travis/install/eb8f56e396a53e354febafe5175189a2/_embedded_binaries/embedded_tools/third_party/py/gflags/init.py' missing. Please remove '/home/travis/.cache/bazel/_bazel_travis/install/eb8f56e396a53e354febafe5175189a2' and try again. Clearing the cache and rebuilding fixes the error. Removing ~/.cache/bazel from the Travis cache should permanently fix the problem.
